fullName.jp: アデルバート・スタイナー

description.jp: アレクサンドリア王家に仕える騎士。王家の意向に従うことこそが 己の使命と信じて疑わなかったが 主君である王女ガーネットや 仲間のジタンたちがそれぞれの生き方を模索する姿に心を動かし 自分が生きる本当の道とは何かを 次第に見つめ直していった。
description.gl: A loyal knight of the royal family of Alexandria. He never once doubted that serving the royal family was his calling until he was inspired by Princess Garnet and his newfound friends to question his real purpose in life.

jp.text: ええい\nこうなれば覚悟を決めました！
おまえに\n最後にこれだけは伝えておこう！
アデルバート＝スタイナー\nただいま はせ参じました！
命令でも\nお受けするわけにはいきません！

gl.text: Well、 now I've made up my mind!
There is something I must tell you!
I am Captain Adelbert Steiner! Grant me the honor of assisting you!
I cannot follow any orders that might put your life in danger.

name.jp: パワーブレイクver.IXエクステンド

desc.en:
「Power Break (IX)」 use +2

When using 「Power Break (IX)」:
- Raises BRV based on party total Max BRV
- BRV attack hit count becomes 5
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency 
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Slightly raises success rate of 「Attack Down」 and moderately improves its effect
- Grants 「Knight's Oath」 for 6 turns

While 「Knight's Oath」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ Raises BRV based on party total Max BRV
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency 
　∟ Greater BRV damage to Humanoid types
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「HP Attack+」
　∟ Raises BRV based on party total Max BRV
　∟ Followed by a melee BRV + HP Attack
　∟ Greater BRV damage to Humanoid types

「Knight's Oath」 raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed
desc.gl:
Power Break (IX) use +2

When using Power Break (IX):
 • Increases BRV based on party's total MAX BRV before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Moderate ATK Down boost, slight hit rate boost
 • Self: 6 turns Own Chivalry

While Own Chivalry active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (increases BRV based on party's total MAX BRV before BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; increased BRV damage to humanoid types)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on party's total MAX BRV before attack; melee BRV attack + HP attack; increased BRV damage to humanoid types)

desc.en:
When using 「Stock Break」:
- Raises party BRV based on party total Max BRV
- Moderately raises BRV potency

While 「Knight's Oath」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」, 「BRV Attack+」 into 「BRV Attack++」
　∟ Raises BRV based on party total Max BRV
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 4 
　∟ Greatly raises total BRV potency compared to 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ Greater BRV damage to Humanoid types
- Turns 「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+」 into 「HP Attack++」
　∟ Raises BRV based on party total Max BRV
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency compared to 「HP Attack+」
　∟ Greater BRV damage to Humanoid types
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Stock Break:
 • Increased BRV based on party's total MAX BRV extended to party
 • Moderate BRV damage boost

While Own Chivalry active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (increases own BRV based on party's total MAX BRV before BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 4; large cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+; deals extra BRV damage to humanoid types)

 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (increases BRV based on party's total MAX BRV before attack; 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost over HP Attack+; deals extra BRV damage to humanoid types; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
desc.jp:
「ストックブレイク」使用時
・味方全員の最大BRVの合計に依存した量の
　BRV加算を味方全体化
・BRV威力中アップ

「己の騎士道」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」「BRV攻撃＋」が
　「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　-BRV攻撃前
　　味方全員の最大BRVの合計に依存した量の
　　BRVを自身に加算
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　　「BRV攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も大アップ
　-人型種に より大きなBRVダメージ
・通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が
　「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　-攻撃前
　　味方全員の最大BRVの合計に依存した量の
　　BRVを自身に加算
　-3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化し
　　「HP攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も中アップ
　-人型種に より大きなBRVダメージ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
